PDFjet.NET
Class PNGImage

Object
  PDFjet.NET.PNGImage

public class PNGImage
extends Object

Used to embed PNG images in the PDF document.

Please note:

Interlaced images are not supported.

To convert interlaced image to non-interlaced image use OptiPNG:

optipng -i0 -o7 myimage.png
